scripts.dev:web: dotenv -e ./.env -c local -v DEV_TYPE=web -- turbo run dev:web --filter=./apps/**/*
scripts.clean: find . \( -name 'node_modules' -type d -or -name 'dist' -type d -or -name 'release' -type d -or -name '.turbo' -type d -or -name '*.tsbuildinfo' -type f \) -prune -print -exec rm -rf '{}' \;
